actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The cyclops makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Maul
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 26 (6d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, range 120 ft. (see Poor Depth Perception)  one target. Hit: 32 (5d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Panicked Rage
special_abilities.desc: While a cyclops is frightened and the source of its fear is in sight, it makes attack rolls with advantage instead of disadvantage.

special_abilities.name: Poor Depth Perception
special_abilities.desc: The cyclops makes all ranged attacks with disadvantage.
